SELECT t.id, t.title, t.nid, t.pid, t.path, t.sort from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where t.deleted = false and t.grade <> 3
and o.operator_id = #{operatorId}

SELECT t.nid from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where t.deleted = false and t.grade = 3
and o.operator_id = #{operatorId}

SELECT
from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and t.deleted = false
select id from sys_menu where pid = #{pid} and deleted = false order by id desc limit 1
